subject: Baseball
lead_paragraph: The rookie Scott Moore hit a grand slam to cap a seven-run third inning against Daisuke Matsuzaka, and the Baltimore Orioles ended a record 11-game home losing streak by defeating the Boston Red Sox, 11-5, last night.
snippet: The rookie Scott Moore hit a grand slam to cap a seven-run third inning against Daisuke Matsuzaka, and the Baltimore Orioles ended a record 11-game home losing streak by defeating the Boston Red Sox, 11-5, last night.
